title: NRTCachingDirectoryFactory should be configurable via solrconfig.xml
description: NRTCachingDirectoryFactory currently hard-codes the values for maxMergeSizeMB and maxCachedMB it uses when creating a new NRTCachingDirectory instance.  These values should be configurable in the usual way via solrconfig.xml.

comments.author: Andy Laird
comments.content: Attached is a simple patch that implements this functionality.
